mapper.sql: Num, SeatMaterial, SportsSeat, SeatHeightAdjustment, LumbarSupportAdjustment, ShoulderSupportAdjustment, Main_passengerSeatElectricAdjustment, AdjustTheBackAngleOfTheSecondRow, TheSecondRowOfSeatsMoves, RearSeatElectricallyAdjusted, ElectrionicSeatMemory, Front_rearSeatsHeated, Front_rearSeatVentilation, Front_backSeatMassage, ThirdRowSeat, BackSeatUpsideDownMode, Front_rearCenterHandrail, TheRearStand
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from seat_configuration
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into seat_configuration (Num, SeatMaterial, SportsSeat, SeatHeightAdjustment, LumbarSupportAdjustment, ShoulderSupportAdjustment, Main_passengerSeatElectricAdjustment, AdjustTheBackAngleOfTheSecondRow, TheSecondRowOfSeatsMoves, RearSeatElectricallyAdjusted, ElectrionicSeatMemory, Front_rearSeatsHeated, Front_rearSeatVentilation, Front_backSeatMassage, ThirdRowSeat, BackSeatUpsideDownMode, Front_rearCenterHandrail, TheRearStand) values (#{num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatmaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sportsseat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seatheightadjustment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lumbarsupportadjustment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shouldersupportadjustment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainPassengerseatelectricadjustment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adjustthebackangleofthesecondrow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thesecondrowofseatsmoves,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rearseatelectricallyadjusted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{electrionicseatmemory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontRearseatsheated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontRearseatventilation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontBackseatmassage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdrowseat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backseatupsidedownmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frontRearcenterhandrail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{therearstand,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
